## Private Member Functions

### combineInstructions() {#a25ecf4588491bac6da40dee361bb834e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MachineCombiner::combineInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB)</>}>
Substitute a slow code sequence with a faster one by evaluating instruction combining pattern.

The prototype of such a pattern is MUl + ADD -&gt; MADD. Performs instruction combining based on machine trace metrics. Only combine a sequence of instructions when this neither lengthens the critical path nor increases resource pressure. When optimizing for codesize always combine when the new sequence is shorter.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp">MachineCombiner.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getDepth() {#a5be421f9c538761c2dcaa81a815cc0a3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned MachineCombiner::getDepth (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; InsInstrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; unsigned, unsigned &gt; &amp; InstrIdxForVirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> BlockTrace, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}>
Computes depth of instructions in vector \\InsInstr.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="InsInstrs">is a vector of machine instructions</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="InstrIdxForVirtReg">is a dense map of virtual register to index of defining machine instruction in <code>InsInstrs</code></ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="BlockTrace">is a trace of machine instructions</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Depth of last instruction in \\InsInstrs (&quot;NewRoot&quot;)
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp">MachineCombiner.cpp</a>.

### getLatenciesForInstrSequences() {#a658f853c7e663857d9217d727b86f5b9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; unsigned, unsigned &gt; MachineCombiner::getLatenciesForInstrSequences (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; InsInstrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DelInstrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> BlockTrace)</>}>
Estimate the latency of the new and original instruction sequence by summing up the latencies of the inserted and deleted instructions.

This assumes that the inserted and deleted instructions are dependent instruction chains, which might not hold in all cases.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp">MachineCombiner.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getLatency() {#a98a9b312c59836f39b0a0b01647cd3a8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned MachineCombiner::getLatency (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; NewRoot, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> BlockTrace)</>}>
Computes instruction latency as max of latency of defined operands.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Root">is a machine instruction that could be replaced by NewRoot. It is used to compute a more accurate latency information for NewRoot in case there is a dependent instruction in the same trace (<code>BlockTrace</code>)</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="NewRoot">is the instruction for which the latency is computed</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="BlockTrace">is a trace of machine instructions</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Latency of <code>NewRoot</code>
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp">MachineCombiner.cpp</a>.

### improvesCriticalPathLen() {#a35ea8bdee6a2b1f1896774bb5b359a88}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MachineCombiner::improvesCriticalPathLen (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> BlockTrace, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; InsInstrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DelInstrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; unsigned, unsigned &gt; &amp; InstrIdxForVirtReg, unsigned Pattern, bool SlackIsAccurate)</>}>
The DAGCombine code sequence ends in MI (Machine <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>) Root.

The new code sequence ends in MI NewRoot. A necessary condition for the new sequence to replace the old sequence is that it cannot lengthen the critical path. The definition of &quot;improve&quot; may be restricted by specifying that the new path improves the data dependency chain (MustReduceDepth).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp/#l00099">99</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecombiner-cpp">MachineCombiner.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
